replies.body: I made a tournament, how do I let my friends join it?
be nice if you included a link to the tipping site

As I understand it the link in the first paragraph of the article ( https://opltips.com.au/ ) is the link to the tipping site, though there does appear to be some issues with the registration going by the other comments.
There seems to be a problem with the registration process, i have the reCAPTCHA ticked but this error keeps popping up: "Please complete the reCAPTCHA validation above".
:D Now I am interested in OPL
i prefer to tip with real money thanks
